EmailTemplate.description: Email to Provider for Case Creation acknowledgement for demographic change request
EmailTemplate.name: BCBS Illinois
EmailTemplate.subject: BCBS of Illinois Demographic Change Request Form Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.Name_Submitter__c},
Thank you for contacting Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Illinois.
This email is confirmation we have received your request, case number {!Case.CaseNumber}, for {!Case.Name_of_Provider_Group__c}.
Your request may take up to 30 days to complete. Once completed, a notification will be sent to the email address submitted with the Demographic Change Request Form.
To check the status of your case, please click on status checker({!$Setup.UtilitySettings_Hierarchy__c.CaseStatusUrl__c}) or for any questions, contact "Netops_Provider_Update@bcbsil.com".
Sincerely, Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Illinois
For Internal Purpose only. (NOTE: Please do not remove the Ref id) Ref id {!Case.Thread_Id}
